Right as you enter the main entrance of the La Bouqueria, this place is stationed to your right hand side. You will see JUAN there. He's friendly and welcoming but watch out for his offerings (he offers you seafood and fresh seafood of the day).  Your dishes can add up as we got beef cheeks and a bacalao dish that were 8 to 9 euros/plate.  Limited 10 person seating area.
